body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Anderson Automotive. My name is Stephen Anderson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my name is Susan Adams.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's nice to meet you, Susan. Can I please have your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's one nine seven five zero six zero nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you provide me with your current residential address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's one two three Maple Avenue, Citytown, Stateville, zero zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you for sharing that information, Susan. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. You've been very helpful. I appreciate it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Susan. Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
